sentences.cn: 很轻松惬意的工作[生活]

sentences.en: He had a fairly cushy upbringing.

sentences.en: He's got himself a very cushy little number.
I thought you had a cushy job.

sentences.en: I wish I had a nice cushy job like her.

sentences.en: Some insiders have known for a while that Ms Riza left on cushy terms.

sentences.en: The boss'son got a cushy job with many perks.

sentences.en: Tom's got a cushy job; if only I had one.

words.tran_cn: 轻松的；容易的；轻松又容易赚钱的
